"Ber a Pentekost da no durii no: "Na awerɛfir mu ara na dede a ɔtse dɛ mframa a n'ano yɛ dzen a ɔrobɔ fi sor bae
nna hɔn nyina ehyia fakor.": na ɔbɛhyɛɛ dan no a wɔtse mu no nyina ma."

"Ber a Pentekost da no durii no: "Na ntɛkyerɛma a wɔapaapaa mu a ɔtse dɛ gya yiyii hɔnho kyerɛɛ hɔn
nna hɔn nyina ehyia fakor.": na wobesisii hɔn etsifi nkorkor."

"Ber a Pentekost da no durii no: "Na Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn bɛhyɛɛ hɔn nyina amaama
nna hɔn nyina ehyia fakor.": na wɔhyɛɛ ase kasaa kasa fofor dɛ mbrɛ Sunsum no dze maa hɔn dɛ wɔnka."

"Ber a Pentekost da no durii no: "Nna Jewfo bi
nna hɔn nyina ehyia fakor.": nyimpa nyamesurofo a wofi amanaman a wɔwɔ wiadze nyinara tse Jerusalɛm."

"Ber a Pentekost da no durii no: "Na wɔtsee dza ɔrokɔ do no
nna hɔn nyina ehyia fakor.": nyimpadodow bae behyiae
"#Lev 23.15-21; Deut 16.9-11": na hɔnho boow hɔn kɛsenara dɛ obiara tse dɛ wɔreka no kurow mu kasa."

"Ber a Pentekost da no durii no: "Na ɔyɛɛ hɔn nyina ahobow
nna hɔn nyina ehyia fakor.": nye nwanwa
"#Lev 23.15-21; Deut 16.9-11": na wɔsesee dɛ
column5: Ana hɔn a wɔrekasa yi nyina nnyɛ Galiliifo bi a?"

"Ber a Pentekost da no durii no: "Na ɔyɛ dɛn na hɛn nyina yɛretse hɛnankasa hɛn kasaa a wɔwoo hɛn wɔ mu yi?"
"Partiafo nye Mediafo nye Elamfo
nna hɔn nyina ehyia fakor.": nye hɔn a wɔtse Mesopotemia nye Judea nye Kapadosia
"#Lev 23.15-21; Deut 16.9-11": Pontus nye Asia
column7: Egypt nye Libiya fa a ɔfa Sirene
column9: Jewfo nye hɔn a wɔadan Jewfo."

"Ber a Pentekost da no durii no: "Kreetefo nye Arabiafo
nna hɔn nyina ehyia fakor.": yɛtse dɛ wɔdze hɛn kasaa reka Nyankopɔn n'etumdze."

"Ber a Pentekost da no durii no: "Na ɔyɛɛ hɔn nyina ahobow
nna hɔn nyina ehyia fakor.": na hɔn tsirmu yɛɛ hɔn konsee
"#Lev 23.15-21; Deut 16.9-11": na wɔsesee hɔnho nkorkor dɛ

"Ber a Pentekost da no durii no: "Na binom sii atwetwe see dɛ
nna hɔn nyina ehyia fakor.": Nsa fofor abow hɔn."

"Ber a Pentekost da no durii no: "Na Peter nye dubiako no soɛree gyinae
nna hɔn nyina ehyia fakor.": na ɔmaa ne ndze do see hɔn dɛ
"#Lev 23.15-21; Deut 16.9-11": Judea mbarimba
column5: nye hom a hom tse Jerusalɛm nyina
column7: na hom ntsie m'asɛm a mereka yi wɔ aso pa mu."

"Ber a Pentekost da no durii no: "Woyinom mmbobowee
nna hɔn nyina ehyia fakor.": dɛ mbrɛ hom susu yi
"#Lev 23.15-21; Deut 16.9-11": osiandɛ adzekyee mu anapa ndɔnkron nye yi;"

"Ber a Pentekost da no durii no: "na iyi nye dza nkɔnhyɛnyi Joel kae no:"
"Nyankopɔn se
nna hɔn nyina ehyia fakor.": Ɔbɛba dɛ nda a odzi ekyir no mu no
"#Lev 23.15-21; Deut 16.9-11": Mubohue mo Sunsum egu honam nyina do: Na hom mbabanyin nye hom mbabaa bɛhyɛ nkɔm
column5: Na hom mberantsɛ bohu enyido adzehu

"Ber a Pentekost da no durii no: "Na mpo mo nkowaa nye mo mfonabaa so do
nna hɔn nyina ehyia fakor.": na nda no mu mubohue mo Sunsum egu na wɔbɛhyɛ nkɔm."

"Ber a Pentekost da no durii no: "Na mebɛma anwanwadze aba wienyi wɔ sor
nna hɔn nyina ehyia fakor.": Nye nsɛnkyerɛdze wɔ asaase yi do ase; Bɔgya nye gya nye wusiw kumbɔɔ;"

"Ber a Pentekost da no durii no: "Ewia bɛdan sum
nna hɔn nyina ehyia fakor.": Na bosoom adan bɔgya
"#Lev 23.15-21; Deut 16.9-11": Ansaana Ewuradze n'enyimnyam da kɛse no aba."

"Ber a Pentekost da no durii no: "Na ɔbɛba dɛ obiara a ɔbɔbɔ Ewuradze ne dzin no
nna hɔn nyina ehyia fakor.": wɔbɛgye no nkwa."

"Ber a Pentekost da no durii no: "Israel mbarimba
nna hɔn nyina ehyia fakor.": hom ntsie nsɛm yi: Jesus Nazarɛtnyi no
"#Lev 23.15-21; Deut 16.9-11": ɔbarimba a Nyankopɔn dze tum ndwuma nye anwanwadze nye nsɛnkyerɛdze a ɔnam no do yɛe wɔ hom mu yii no kyerɛɛ hom
column5: dɛ mbrɛ homankasa so hom nyim no."

"Ber a Pentekost da no durii no: "Ɔno na
nna hɔn nyina ehyia fakor.": dɛ mbrɛ Nyankopɔn ahyehyɛ ato hɔ na onyim dada no
"#Lev 23.15-21; Deut 16.9-11": dze no maa hom
column6: na hom nam hɔn a wɔnnka mbra nsa do bɔɔ no mbeamudua mu kum no no."

"Ber a Pentekost da no durii no: "Ɔno na Nyankopɔn nyaan no
nna hɔn nyina ehyia fakor.": ɔasan owuyaw no
"#Lev 23.15-21; Deut 16.9-11": osiandɛ ɔnnkɛyɛ yie dɛ owu botum aka no ahyɛ."

"Ber a Pentekost da no durii no: "Na David ka wɔ no ho dɛ
nna hɔn nyina ehyia fakor.": Muhun Ewuradze wɔ m'enyim daa
"#Lev 23.15-21; Deut 16.9-11": Osiandɛ ɔwɔ me nsa nyimfa

"Ber a Pentekost da no durii no: "Dɛm ntsi m'akoma tɔɔ me yamu
nna hɔn nyina ehyia fakor.": na me tɛkyerɛma dzii dɛw
"#Lev 23.15-21; Deut 16.9-11": Na mo honam so bɔhom enyidado mu;"

"Ber a Pentekost da no durii no: "Osiandɛ irinngyaa me kra wɔ samanadze
nna hɔn nyina ehyia fakor.": eso eremma wo Krɔnkrɔnnyi no nhu mprɔwee."

"Ber a Pentekost da no durii no: "Akyerɛ me nkwa akwan no: Edze w'enyim bɛma enyigye amee me."
"Enuanom
nna hɔn nyina ehyia fakor.": mowɔ ho kwan dɛ meka egyapanyin David ho asɛm kofee kyerɛ hom
"#Lev 23.15-21; Deut 16.9-11": dɛ oewu na woesie no
column5: na ne nda wɔ hɛn nkyɛn ha dze bodu ndɛ."

"Ber a Pentekost da no durii no: "Na dɛ ɔyɛ nkɔnhyɛnyi na onyim dɛ Nyankopɔn aka ntam akyerɛ no dɛ n'asefo mu bi na ɔbɛma ɔatsena n'ahengua do ntsi
"#Lev 23.15-21; Deut 16.9-11": "ohunii siei
column5: na ɔkaa Kraest no wunyan ho asɛm dɛ oenngyaa ne kra wɔ samanadze

"Ber a Pentekost da no durii no: "Jesus yi na Nyankopɔn nyaan no
nna hɔn nyina ehyia fakor.": na hɛn nyina yɛ ho adasefo."

"Ber a Pentekost da no durii no: "Na afei wɔdze Nyankopɔn abanyimfa maa no do no
nna hɔn nyina ehyia fakor.": na onyaa Egya no hɔ Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn no anohoba no ntsi na oehue dza hom ruhu na hom retse yi egu."

"Ber a Pentekost da no durii no: "Na David ammfow sor
nna hɔn nyina ehyia fakor.": naaso ɔnoara ka dɛ
"#Lev 23.15-21; Deut 16.9-11": Ewuradze see mo wura dɛ

"Ber a Pentekost da no durii no: "Kodu dɛ medze w'atamfo bɛyɛ w'ananadzegua."
"Dɛm ntsi
nna hɔn nyina ehyia fakor.": wɔmma Israel fie nyina nhu ampa dɛ Jesus yi a hom bɔɔ no mbeamudua mu no
"#Lev 23.15-21; Deut 16.9-11": ɔno na Nyankopɔn ayɛ no Ewuradze nye Kraest."

"Ber a Pentekost da no durii no: "Na wɔtsee nsɛm no hɔn akoma mu wowɔɔ hɔn
nna hɔn nyina ehyia fakor.": na wɔsee Peter nye asomafo nkaa no dɛ
"#Lev 23.15-21; Deut 16.9-11": Enuanom

"Ber a Pentekost da no durii no: "Na Peter see hɔn dɛ
nna hɔn nyina ehyia fakor.": Hom nnu homho
"#Lev 23.15-21; Deut 16.9-11": na wonnuma hom nyina wɔ Jesus Kraest ne dzin mu nkɔ bɔnfakyɛ mu
column5: na hom benya Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn no akyɛdze no."

"Ber a Pentekost da no durii no: "Osiandɛ anohoba no yɛ hom nye hom mba nye hɔn a wɔwɔ ekyirekyir a Ewuradze hɛn Nyankopɔn bɛfrɛ hɔn aba ne nkyɛn nyina dze."
"Na ɔdze nsɛm pii kaa ho gyee dase kyerɛɛ hɔn
nna hɔn nyina ehyia fakor.": na otuu hɔn fo dɛ
"#Lev 23.15-21; Deut 16.9-11": Hom ngye homho mfi mbasantsen a hɔn bra akyewakyew yi ho."

"Ber a Pentekost da no durii no: "Na hɔn a wɔgyee n'asɛm no
nna hɔn nyina ehyia fakor.": wonumaa hɔn
"#Lev 23.15-21; Deut 16.9-11": na da no ara akra bɛyɛ mpensa bɛkaa hɔn ho."

"Ber a Pentekost da no durii no: "Na wɔkɔr do suoo asomafo no hɔn nkyerɛkyerɛ nye hɔn fɛkuwbɔ
nna hɔn nyina ehyia fakor.": nye paanoo bubu no nye mpaabɔ mu."

"Ber a Pentekost da no durii no: "Na asomafo no yɛɛ anwanwadze nye nsɛnkyerɛdze pii
nna hɔn nyina ehyia fakor.": na hu kaa nyimpa nyina."

"Ber a Pentekost da no durii no: "Na hɔn a wɔgyee dzii nyina boaa ano na wɔyɛɛ hɔn adze nyina dɛ kwasafodze;"
"na wɔtɔɔn hɔn ahodze nye hɔn ndzɛmba
nna hɔn nyina ehyia fakor.": na wɔkyɛe maa hɔn nyina
"#Lev 23.15-21; Deut 16.9-11": dɛ mbrɛ obiara n'ehiadze tse."

"Ber a Pentekost da no durii no: "Na daa daa wɔkɔr do dze anokor bɔɔ mu hyiae wɔ asɔrfi no mu
nna hɔn nyina ehyia fakor.": na wohyiaa efiefi bubuu paanoo
"#Lev 23.15-21; Deut 16.9-11": na wɔdze ahosɛpɛw nye komakor dzii hɔn edziban."

"Ber a Pentekost da no durii no: "Woyii Nyankopɔn ayɛw na wonyaa enyimpa wɔ ɔman no nyina enyim. Na Ewuradze dze hɔn a wɔregye hɔn nkwa no kaa hɔn ho daa daa."
